Working in the console

After the boot, the first console will automaticly log you in as root. On the other consoles you should use login root, password is not required.

The default Frenzy shell is tcsh.

To switch layouts in console use the Ctrl+Shift key combination.

8 virtual consoles are available by default. You can switch between them useng the Alt+Fn combination (F1-F8). To switch to the system messages console press Alt+F12.

To turn on scroll mode press ScrollLock. You can scroll the console in scroll mode by using the arrow keys and “PageUp” & “PageDown” keys. To turn scroll mode off press ScrollLock again.
